text: The Right of Way is a lost 1915 silent film directed by John W. Noble and starring William Faversham. It is based on a 1907 play by Eugene Wiley Presbrey from the book by Sir Gilbert Parker. It was distributed by Metro Pictures. Faversham's motion picture debut. The film was remade as The Right of Way in 1920 starring Bert Lytell. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1915 films Category:American silent feature films Category:Lost American films Category:Films directed by John Noble Category:American films Category:Films based on Canadian novels Category:Films based on works by Gilbert Parker Category:American black-and-white films Category:Metro Pictures films
title: The Right of Way (1915 film)
